about_the_game:
The Game

  • Dive into the moving story of a wolf caught in the heart of a clan war.

  • Expand your pack by recruiting new companions.

  • Strengthen your bond with companions to unlock powerful bonuses.

  • Battle to conquer territories from rival clans and unlock new hunting grounds.

  • Hunt a variety of prey to earn valuable rewards.

  • Complete exciting challenges with Steam achievements.

  • Explore hidden areas in this vast open world.

  • Climb the multiplayer leaderboards as you progress through your adventure.

The Story and Clans

Narrative is at the heart of the Wolf Survival experience. Each step of the journey reveals new companions and unforgettable moments.

The player's story begins in a snow-covered territory where resources are scarce and survival is a constant struggle. As a member of an isolated clan, you’ll face ruthless enemies while fighting to ensure the survival of your pack in a fierce battle for the most fertile territories.

Territories and Companions

Explore a vast open world made up of diverse landscapes, from frozen plains to lush forests. Conquering these territories secures safe hunting zones, allowing you to gain affinity points with your companions or gather essential resources for your pack.

These companions, your true allies, can be summoned to fight by your side during your journey in exchange for precious pack resources.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Dive into the epic adventure of Wolf Survival and step into the paws of a wolf! Expand your pack across diverse landscapes in a vast open world, and unlock companions as you experience the thrilling story of a wolf caught in the heart of a clan war for the best hunting grounds.
